scripts.test-physics: browserify physics/test/*.js physics/test/*/*.js | npm run tape
scripts.test: EXIT_STATUS=0; npm run lint -s || EXIT_STATUS=$?; npm run test-components -s || EXIT_STATUS=$?; npm run test-core -s || EXIT_STATUS=$?; npm run test-dom-renderables -s || EXIT_STATUS=$?; npm run test-dom-renderers -s || EXIT_STATUS=$?; npm run test-engine -s || EXIT_STATUS=$?; npm run test-math -s || EXIT_STATUS=$?; npm run test-physics -s || EXIT_STATUS=$?; npm run test-polyfills -s || EXIT_STATUS=$?; npm run test-utilities -s || EXIT_STATUS=$?; npm run test-webgl-geometries -s || EXIT_STATUS=$?; npm run test-webgl-materials -s || EXIT_STATUS=$?; npm run test-webgl-renderables -s || EXIT_STATUS=$?; npm run test-webgl-renderers -s || EXIT_STATUS=$?; exit $EXIT_STATUS
scripts.lint-jscs: jscs core dom-renderers physics renderers utilities webgl-materials webgl-renderers components dom-renderables engine math polyfills transitions webgl-geometries webgl-renderables webgl-shaders
scripts.lint: EXIT_STATUS_LINT=0; npm run lint-eslint -s || EXIT_STATUS_LINT=$?; npm run lint-eslint-jsdoc -s || EXIT_STATUS_LINT=$?; npm run lint-jscs -s || EXIT_STATUS_LINT=$?; exit $EXIT_STATUS_LINT
